title: Monk armor
summaries: Monk armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 450000*45 [img:Defender Medal] in total after defeating any mechanical boss, and provides summon as well as melee damage bonuses. The set consists of the Monk's Bushy Brow Bald Cap, Monk's Shirt, and Monk's Pants.
A full set of Monk armor provides the following stats:

• +46 defense
  • +20% melee damage
  • +30% summon damage
  • +15% melee critical strike chance
  • +2 sentry slots
  • +20% melee speed
  • +20% movement speed

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the attack rate of the <linked>Lightning Aura sentry summons</linked> and will cause them to deal <linked>critical hits</linked> with a fixed 16.67% chance.
The <linked>Shinobi Infiltrator armor</linked> can be considered a direct upgrade of the Monk armor.
